name: models_by_make_id_year_category
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool motorcycle_specs_database.
Tool description: --- DEMO http://api-motorcycle.makingdatameaningful.com/ ----

The complete Motorcycle Database with specifications for all Makes & Models [year 1900 to 2023].  Full specs & images included. Real-Time updated.
We provide a motorcycle database delivered through API. There are more than 35,000 moto models available along with 20+ technical information fields. One image per model is also included.  Our fast API is delivered through several endpoints in order to satisfy different request types.  ...
API description: get model by make ID, year and category:

ex: /api/v1/model/make-id/55/2010/Sport

year.description: The year of the motorcycle models to retrieve.

category.description: The category of the motorcycle models to retrieve.

make.description: The make ID of the motorcycle models to retrieve.
